short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Share Folders and Drives between Computers on your LAN and access / copy files across PC (Windows), Mac, Chromebook & Linux Desktops

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
*** This version allows access to a limited amount of files in each folder. The restriction can be removed via an in-app purchase. ***

- Simple to use File Explorer
- Built in MP3 / MP4 file streaming
- Support for Chromebook File Manager (must be enabled via app settings)
- Image / PDF Viewer
- Compatible with Windows, Mac, Linux and ChromeOS

LanFolder allows sharing of folders across computers on your home network without worrying about platform specific sharing setups. 

Connections are established directly between computers without any intermediary cloud or proxy.
